name: Vaibhav Dara
text: The movie was a tour de force of storytelling. I was utterly captivated by the characters and the world they inhabited. I can't get the movie out of my head.

name: Sumer Chopra
text: The movie was a true cinematic triumph.

name: Dummy
text: This movie will stay with me for a long time. I highly recommend this movie to everyone.

name: queen
text: I can't wait for the sequel.

name: Kimaya Bansal
text: The movie was an absolute masterpiece. I was left speechless by the sheer beauty of it all. I felt like I was right there with the characters.

name: Shanaya Gole
text: The movie was an absolute delight to watch.
